text: Ezɨ enselɨn korotiar ghurghurim aruzim, kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Dughiar kam otivam, enselɨn bar ekiam Maikel, kar Israelɨn gumazamizibar garir ensel, an otogham. Eghtɨ dughiar kamɨn osɨmtɨzir bar ekiam otivam. Egha fomɨra osɨmtɨzir kamaghɨn garitam nguazir kamɨn nguibatamɨn otozir puvatɨ. Ezɨ dughiar osɨmtɨzir kam otivamim, Israelian gumazamizir men ziaba Godɨn akɨnafarimɨn aven itiba God ua me iniam.
